thread.title: Country singers to play Byfield's Rainforest Ranch
thread.title_full: Country singers to play Byfield's Rainforest Ranch

title: Country singers to play Byfield's Rainforest Ranch
text:
Country singers to play Byfield's Rainforest Ranch 10th Oct 2015 6:00 AM Amber Lawrence brings mature musicianship to Twin Towns during July. supplied Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
HOT on the heels of winning this year's Country Music Awards of Australia's Female Artist and Male Artist Golden Guitar awards in Tamworth, Amber Lawrence and Luke O'Shea, have announced their first double-header winners' tour, appropriately titled The Golden Roads Tour. 
Amber and Luke are two of Australia's most loved and respected artists. 
Their respective wins herald in the new breed of Australian country artists who, after years of slogging it out on the touring circuit, are finally receiving recognition for their efforts by industry peers and fans alike. 
And come November 13, the two-hour show will be held at Byfield's tranquil Rainforest Ranch, featuring Amber and Luke performing their hits and fan-favourite songs, along with some duets and fun anecdotes. 
Rainforest Ranch has been hosting regular Sunday sessions for locals, but this will be their biggest gig yet. 
Amber and Luke have become known for their cheeky stage personas and energetic performances, which always have the audience on their toes or dancing on their feet. 
Amber is the recipient of no less than 10 awards in her career so far including the prestigious Golden Guitar, Telstra Horizon Award, Southern Star Independent Country Music Artist of the Year Award and many more nominations for the likes of CMC Artist of the Year and APRA awards. 
Luke was the recipient of three Golden Guitar Awards this year for Male Artist of the Year, APRA Song of the Year and Heritage Song of the Year. 
Luke also joins Graeme Connors, Lee Kernaghan and James Blundell as the only Australian artists to have won two consecutive APRA Songs of the Year. Not done yet, Luke also took home four Southern Star Independent Country Music Awards this year; Album of the Year, Song of the Year, Male Vocal of the Year and Artist of the Year. 
Both Amber and Luke are passionate about touring, performing and entertaining their fans. 
IF YOU GO 
WHEN: Friday, November, 13, from 6pm 
WHERE: Rainforest Ranch, Byfield 
Go to rainforestranch.com.au/ to book amber lawrence
